title: STAT+: OHSU board votes to negotiate with NIH and transform its primate center into an animal sanctuary
description: The vote came as NIH looks to transition at least one of seven national primate research centers into an animal sanctuary.
content: The vote came as NIH looks to transition at least one of seven national primate research centers into an animal sanctuary.
